Okay so I have never had any problems with KaOs' torrents but I am having an issue with this one, it worked just fine installing it and what not but when I run it I hear the sound of the game running and what I think is the main menu but I can't tell if it really is it or not for I have no picture other than a black screen as if the resolution is not compatible with the screen, I play my games on my laptop but I use a TV for the main screen the TV uses a resolution of 1330 by 720 and when I tried to start with that it told me image not compatible with screen, I then tried to run it on just my laptop and thus discovered that there is no image when I run it just the sound of the main developer logos and the main menu screen, I ran that codec it told me I might need to play before the initial start up and thought maybe that was the problem, so I reinstalled it and didn't run the codec still had the same problem. Reinstalled it again and never tried to run it on the TV just the laptop screen but still not working. I am running Window's 7 home premium 64-Bit, any help on how to fix this would be great as I have been looking for a good torrent of this game for a very long time.
